name: Alec Bradley - Spirit of Cuba - Habano - Robusto
brand: Alec Bradley, Spirit of Cuba - Habano
additionalNotes: Spirit of Cuba is a mixed filler value cigar produced by Alec Bradley Cigars in Honduras. It is made in “Cuban sandwich” fashion—using a mixture of long and short filler tobacco to produce a very easy draw and even burn. This cigar employs a Nicaraguan habano wrapper, a Nicaraguan binder, and a 3-country blend of fillers from Nicaragua, Costa Rica, and Colombia.
